Package com.gsm.exception

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
  • @ControllerAdvice
public class GlobalExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A centralized exception handling class for the entire application. Any exception thrown from a Controller will be caught here.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GlobalExceptionHandler()

      java.lang.String handleGenericException​(java.lang.Exception ex, org.springframework.ui.Model model)

    • Method Detail

      • handleResourceNotFoundException

        @ExceptionHandler(ResourceNotFoundException.class)
@ResponseStatus(NOT_FOUND)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> handleResourceNotFoundException​(ResourceNotFoundException ex,
                                                                                                 org.springframework.web.context.request.WebRequest request)
        Handles ResourceNotFoundException (HTTP 404). This method is primarily for API calls, returning a structured JSON error response.
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception that was thrown.
        request - The current web request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity containing the JSON error body and 404 status.

      • handleDuplicateResourceException

        @ExceptionHandler(DuplicateResourceException.class)
@ResponseStatus(CONFLICT)
public java.lang.String handleDuplicateResourceException​(DuplicateResourceException ex,
                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Catches and handles DuplicateResourceException (HTTP 409). Instead of showing an error page, it redirects back to the form and displays a message.
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception that was thrown.
        request - Used to get the URL of the page that caused the error.
        redirectAttributes - Used to pass an error message across a redirect.
        Returns:
        A redirect command.

      • handleGenericException

        @ExceptionHandler(java.lang.Exception.class)
@ResponseStatus(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
public java.lang.String handleGenericException​(java.lang.Exception ex,
                                               org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Catches all other exceptions (fallback) to prevent the application from crashing (HTTP 500).
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception that was thrown.
        model - Used to pass error information to the view page.
        Returns:
        The name of the 500 error view page.
